name: One Last Summer Night
content: I see the lights from the aeroplanes
The good things always have to went
The moon is watching you and me
Can we turn back the time
Before the best thing is over
Can we turn back the time
You and I are so in love
I just can't move on by myself
Can we turn back the time
Before the best thing is over
Can we turn back the time
Hoping gain and because you are eyes
Can we turn back the time
Before the best thing is over
Can we turn back the time
Before the best thing is over
Can we turn back the time
